verbs.description: [ARG1: issues with organizational structure] [ARG0: no one] [V: thinks] [ARG2: about an organization structure] [ARGM-TMP: until something goes wrong and profits plummet] or customers complain that when reporting relationships operational metrics and business culture come under scrutiny proactive business leaders take the time to analyze the organizational structure from the organizational structure
